text: Begum Kamrun Nahar Jafar is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Chittagong-10. ==Career== Jafar was elected to parliament from Chittagong-10 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1988. She served as a Member of Parliament from the reserved women's seat 29 in the Second Parliament in 1979 and in the Third Parliament in 1986. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Women members of the Jatiya Sangsad Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:2nd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Begum Kamrun Nahar Jafar
